subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Nets’ margin of error over the past three games can essentially be measured in three possessions and 3 points. The resulting burden has manifested itself in blank stares and an unusually quiet locker room.
snippet: The Nets’ margin of error over the past three games can essentially be measured in three possessions and 3 points. The resulting burden has manifested itself in blank stares and an unusually quiet locker room.
